metadata.title: CVE-2025-21671 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:zram: fix potential UAF of zram tableIf zram_meta_alloc failed early, it frees allocated zram->table withoutsetting it NULL.  Which will potentially cause zram_meta_free to accessthe table if user reset an failed and uninitialized device.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
